title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI/Docker command and an OpenAI-compatible REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party async/sync Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings; pip install langchain-ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters; Maven Central.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; crates.io publish, Tokio support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight reference chat app (Next.js) showing Ollama streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; gem install ollama-cli.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers via Ollama; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU nodes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama sidecars in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models via Slack.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes & generate text using Ollama models locally.

title: ollama-mistral
summary: Official Ollama doc & model file for running Mistral 7B with custom system prompts.

title: ollama-rag-example
summary: Reference repo showing RAG pipeline combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.
